A small Star hopper comes down towards earth as to red eyes glare "computer  
enter stealth mode we don't want to draw any unneeded attention." As the ship 
cloaks  itself "Is the one I seek here or is this just another wild goose 
chase." The target is at vector  6 moving due east. You need to to choose a 
new mode "What kind is that ?" 
A beastmode.

As the Hopper sets down in far off region the burning red eyes close "stay 
cloaked and  send out 6 drones have them select the strongest creatures on 
this planet and copy and combine there DNA and show me the test results "Soon 
I shall awaken."  

As the six drones leave each scanning all the  predatory creatures it come 
across. 

"Excellent we have a winner"  Beastmode is created junction to robot mode in 
4 3 2 1.
